mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ACTI_LIKE WHERE B_NO = #{B_NO} AND M_ID = 'aa'
mapper.select: SELECT b.B_NO num, b.B_TITLE title, b.M_ID writer, b.B_CONTENT content, f.B_FILENAME fileName, b.B_STATUS, b.B_CREATEDATE FROM ACTI_BOARD b LEFT JOIN ACTI_FILE f on f.B_NO = b.B_NO ORDER BY b.B_NO DESC;

SELECT b.B_NO num, b.B_TITLE title, b.M_ID writer, b.B_CONTENT content, f.B_FILENAME fileName, b.B_STATUS, b.B_CREATEDATE FROM ACTI_BOARD b LEFT JOIN ACTI_FILE f on f.B_NO = b.B_NO ORDER BY b.B_NO DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT B_NO num, B_TITLE title, M_ID writer, B_CONTENT content, B_CREATEDATE createDate, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACTI_LIKE WHERE B_NO= #{num}) countLike FROM ACTI_BOARD WHERE B_NO = #{num}
